question: What is the name of the portal to be launched by the Union Commerce and Industry ministry, to facilitate domestic investors?
explanation:
The Union Commerce and Industry Ministry is in the process of developing a portal for hand-holding domestic investors.
Named as ‘Atmanirbhar Niveshak Mitra’, it provides information dissemination and facilitation of domestic investors. It is in the testing phase and will be launched by May 1, 2021. The Ministry is also working on webpage to be available in regional languages and a related mobile application.
